kickstart.post:
MANPATH /opt/condor/man
condor_negotiator 9614/tcp # Condor daemon condor_collector 9618/tcp # Condor daemon
/sbin/chkconfig --add rocks-condor
`/bin/cat /opt/condor/etc/examples/condor_config.generic | \ sed -e 's@^LOCAL_DIR.*@LOCAL_DIR = /var/opt/condor@' -e 's@^LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE.*@LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE = /opt/condor/etc/condor_config.local@'`
/bin/mkdir -p /var/opt/condor /bin/mkdir -p /var/opt/condor/execute /bin/mkdir -p /var/opt/condor/log /bin/mkdir -p /var/opt/condor/spool /bin/mkdir -p /var/opt/condor/cred_dir
chown -R 407.407 /var/opt/condor
